name: Wrappa-Ball
description:
Wrappa-Ball

Using your trusty paddle, wack the ball into enemies without touching them yourself! Hit the ball against the edges of the screen to send it flying out the other side! How long will you survive in this chaotic physics-based arcade game!

Made for the Brackeys 2023.1 Game Jam. The theme was "An end is a new beginning".

Controls

Click / Tap & Drag on the paddle to move it around on the screen

Works on Mobile as well!

Attributions

Font: Arco - dafont.com

Background Music: Shady Dave Ambient Loop - freesound.org

Sound Effects: Kenny Impact Sounds, Kenny Casino Audio
